resources.string:
YOUR MISSION 
Signalize areas with nails on a map divided into safe areas and areas with nails. 

STARTING THE GAME 
This page allows you to choose a map according to the shape and size of areas. 
The game takes place on the selected map. 
Click on one of the map 

GOOD LUCK 

THANKS to the inventors of Minesweeper game, to the big community for its many tools and examples.

The game starts when you click on the map at random. 
Several areas are discovered: 
- either a number appears indicating the number of areas with nails that are in contact with the discovered area 
- either the discovered area is surrounded by areas without nails 
You can locate new safe areas and areas with nails or you will have to click randomly on new areas. 

 Two buttons are available: 
 - a button with nails 
 - a button without nails 
If the button with nails is selected and if you click on an area: 
 - a road sign appears, indicating that the area might contain nails 
If the button without nails is selected and if you click on an area: 
 - either a number appears indicating the number of areas with nails that are in contact with the selected area 
 - either several numbers appear if the clicked area is surrounded by areas without nails 
 - or you lose if the clicked area contains nails. 

The number of marked areas and the number of zones with nails are displayed above the map. 
You win if you marked all areas with nails and if you discover all safe areas. 

There is a TEST mode that allows to train: the game goes even if an error occurs
